scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, with hands clasped in prayer and a halo of rays, standing behind a large, green, scaly dragon. The dragon has a reptilian head with prominent eyes and a gaping mouth, from which a blue cloth is emerging. The Virgin Mary is dressed in an orange gown and a blue mantle. The background is a stylized landscape with rolling green hills, scattered trees, and a pale blue sky. The entire scene is framed by an arched border decorated with floral motifs.
scene_interpretation: The Virgin Mary Treading on the Serpent
